act:
1106980 THE COLONIAL PRISONERS REMOVAL (REPEAL) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 12 OF 2001 [ 9th May, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Colonial Prisoners Removal Act, 1884.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
944942 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Colonial Prisoners Removal (Repeal) Act, 2001.
1530267 2Repeal of Acts 47 and 48 Vict., C. 31.- The Colonial Prisoners Removal Act, 1884 is hereby repealed.
